delete.subheader: This action can not be reverted.

empty.subheader: To create an SSH key, click Create Key.

notAvailable.subheader: The private key is only available for download at the time of creating a key. This application does not store the private key.

active.tip: You can use this key when connecting to your workspaces.

inactive.tip: You can not use this key when connecting to your workspaces.

warning.subheader: This is your only chance to download the private key. The private key is secret information that should not be shared with others. It should be stored and handled carefully.
